description.zh: 基本标签的用法，可以通过添加 `closable` 变为可关闭标签。可关闭标签具有 `onClose` `afterClose` 两个事件。
description.en: Usage of basic Tag, and it could be closable by set `closable` property. Closable Tag supports `onClose` `afterClose` events.

description.zh: 我们添加了多种预设色彩的标签样式，用作不同场景使用。如果预设值不能满足你的需求，可以设置为具体的色值。
description.en:
We preset a series of colorful tag style for different situation usage.
And you can always set it to a hex color string for custom color.

examples.source:
import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import { Tag } from 'choerodon-ui'; ReactDOM.render(

Presets:

pink magenta red volcano orange yellow gold cyan lime green blue geekblue purple dark gray

Presets inverse:

pink-inverse magenta-inverse red-inverse volcano-inverse orange-inverse yellow-inverse gold-inverse cyan-inverse lime-inverse green-inverse blue-inverse geekblue-inverse purple-inverse dark-inverse gray-inverse

Custom:

#f50 #2db7f5 #87d068 #108ee9
, document.getElementById('container'), );

description.zh: 用数组生成一组标签，可以动态添加和删除，通过监听删除动画结束的事件 `afterClose` 实现。
description.en:
Generating a set of Tags by array, you can add and remove dynamically.
It's based on `afterClose` event, which will be triggered while the close animation end.

description.zh:
可通过 `CheckableTag` 实现类似 Checkbox 的效果，点击切换选中效果。

> 该组件为完全受控组件，不支持非受控用法。
description.en:
`CheckableTag` works like Checkbox, click it to toggle checked state.

> it is an absolute controlled component and has no uncontrolled mode.

node.html:
Tag

Property Description Type Default
afterClose Callback executed when close animation is completed () => void -
closable Whether Tag can be closed boolean false
color Color of the Tag string -
onClose Callback executed when tag is closed (e) => void -

Tag.CheckableTag

Property Description Type Default
checked Checked status of Tag boolean false
onChange Callback executed when Tag is checked/unchecked (checked) => void -

pageContext.description:
Tag for categorizing or markup.

When To Use

  • It can be used to tag by dimension or property.
  • When categorizing.
